panels.description: InnoDB Buffer Pool Size requires setting 'interval_slow' to some value above 0 in the Telegraf MySQL configuration. This allows Telegraf to perform 'show global variables'
panels.title: InnoDB Buffer Pool Size

panels.description: Useful for determining buffer pool size compared to total RAM. Currently can't get this as a % because of InfluxDB limitations (can't do calculations across measurements)
panels.title: Total RAM

targets.alias: InnoDB Additional Memory Pool Size (NOTE: This if found via 'show engine innodb status' and has not yet been implemented in Telegraf
InnoDB Dictionary Size (NOTE: This if found via 'show engine innodb status' and has not yet been implemented in Telegraf
Adaptive Hash Index Size (NOTE: This if found via 'show engine innodb status' and has not yet been implemented in Telegraf

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max(/commands_*/), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)
SELECT difference(max(/commands_*/)) FROM "mysql" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max(/handler_*/), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max(/handler_(commit|rollback|savepoint.*|prepare)/), 1s) FROM "mysql" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)

panels.description: Requires gather_process_list = true in Telegraf MySQL plugin configuration
panels.title: Process States

panels.description: Requires gather_process_list = true in Telegraf MySQL plugin configuration

targets.query: SELECT sum(/threads_*/) FROM "mysql_info_schema" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1h)

panels.title: Top Process States Hourly

panels.description: Query cache size requires setting 'interval_slow' to some value above 0 in the Telegraf MySQL configuration. This allows Telegraf to perform 'show global variables'
panels.title: MySQL Query Cache Memory

panels.description: Open Files Limit requires setting 'interval_slow' to some value above 0 in the Telegraf MySQL configuration. This allows Telegraf to perform 'show global variables'
panels.title: MySQL Open Files

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("table_open_cache_hits"), 1s)/(non_negative_derivative(max("table_open_cache_hits"), 1s) + non_negative_derivative(max("table_open_cache_misses"), 1s)) FROM "mysql" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)

panels.description: Table Open Cache requires setting 'interval_slow' to some value above 0 in the Telegraf MySQL configuration. This allows Telegraf to perform 'show global variables'
panels.title: MySQL Open Tables

panels.description: Requires plugin [[inputs.kernel_vmstat]] be uncommented in the Telegraf configuration
panels.title: I/O Activity

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("read_time"), 1s)/non_negative_derivative(max("reads"), 1s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("write_time"), 1s)/non_negative_derivative(max("writes"), 1s) FROM "diskio" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)

panels.description: This requires the '[[inputs.net]]' plugin be uncommented in the Telegraf configuration
panels.title: Network Traffic

panels.description: This requires the '[[inputs.kernel_vmstat]]' plugin be uncommented in the Telegraf configuration

targets.query: SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("pswpin"), 1s) FROM "kernel_vmstat" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)
SELECT non_negative_derivative(max("pswpin"), 1s) FROM "kernel_vmstat" WHERE "host" =~ /^$Host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1s)

panels.title: Swap Activity

list.label: Host
list.name: Host
list.query: show tag values on "db_metrics" from "mysql" with key = "host"
